text: Amy Marie Madigan (born September 11, 1950) is an American television and movie actress. She has acted in many notable movies and TV series. These include the 1989 movie Field of Dreams and Uncle Buck and the series Grey's Anatomy, Carniv√†le and Fringe. She was born in Chicago. She married the actor Ed Harris in 1983. They have one daughter, Lily Dolores, born in 1993. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1950 births Category:Living people
title: Amy Madigan
